name: Eater
overview: A Pac-Man style collect-em-up variant created by Federico Canetta and published in Italy in Software Club N°15. A new adventure for our flying Pac-Man who will try to eat as many balls as possible. As always, he is being chased by a ghost who will try to prevent him from continuing in his intent. Obviously it will be you, with the Joystick in port 2, who will guide his moves and help him jump and move from one area to another in search of the precious balls.
